title: Exicom acquires US EV charging company Tritium for Rs 310 crore

This follows a high FPI investment in September. Analysts suggest that long-term domestic investors might find opportunities in undervalued banking stocks.

title: Primary market takes breather, 2 IPOs to raise Rs 365 crore this week
description: After a busy period, the IPO market is slowing with only two public issues next week, targeting Rs 365 crore. Garuda Construction aims to raise Rs 264 crore, and Shiv Texchem targets Rs 101 crore. Despite this slowdown, the IPO market's outlook remains strong with numerous firms awaiting approvals to raise significant capital.

title: Industry upbeat on policy continuity as business confidence index rises to 2-quarter high: CII

Despite global uncertainties, 59% of surveyed firms expect improved private capex, and many anticipate RBI rate cuts by Q3 FY25.

title: 'Need attractive regime for China+1 to succeed'
description: ADB chief economist Albert Park highlights India's growth strategy, focusing on infrastructure investment, regulatory ease, and business-friendly policies. Projected to grow at 7%, India benefits from demographic dividend and a positive investment climate. He stresses the need for labor-intensive sectors to tackle employment and advises minimizing economic restrictions despite geopolitical tensions.

title: IT companies appraisal, hike cycles shift from June to September quarter
description: Salary increases in IT companies have shifted from the traditional April-June period to later in the year, influenced by fluctuating demand. This shift has led to unpredictable hikes and varied timing, with factors like high attrition and sluggish demand influencing decisions.

title: Catalysing AI innovation with safeguards, says Ashwini Vaishnaw

Speaking at ETSA 2024, he stresses the importance of democratizing technology, balancing innovation with safeguards, and fostering solutions in sectors like healthcare, agriculture, and the creator economy.

title: 'Ice cream isn't just dessert... it's a snack'
description: Ice creams are now year-round indulgences in India due to better storage and indoor shopping environments, explains Mohit Khattar of Graviss Foods. Varieties like ice cream sandwiches have become popular snacks, while quick service expectations drive sales. Indoor comfort regardless of outdoor temperatures supports the shift in consumer behavior, turning ice creams into everyday treats.

title: Amul ready to foray into Europe market, says MD
description: Amul has successfully launched its milk in the US and is set to enter the European market. India, now the largest milk producer, is poised to supply one-third of the world's milk. The cooperative model from India, exemplified by Dr. Verghese Kurien, is highlighted as a significant contribution.

title: Farmers get third of veggies' retail price: RBI study
description: Indian farmers receive only about one-third of the final selling price of fruits and vegetables, with intermediaries taking the majority share, in contrast to sectors like dairy where farmers get 70%. Research by RBI suggests policymakers improve productivity, expand storage, and leverage digital platforms to stabilize prices and increase farmers' earnings.

title: Govt steps in to address finance concerns of exporters
description: The commerce department is planning a long-term solution for exporters' credit issues by considering a credit guarantee fund. This fund will help businesses access finance without needing collaterals. Exporters are currently struggling with declining export credit and high costs. Consulting firm EY is involved in assessing various options for improvement.

title: ‘Need attractive investment regime for China+1 to succeed’
description: ADB chief economist cautions subsidies alone won’t help

Escalating Middle East tensions and foreign fund outflows contributed to the overall market downturn. Notably, Infosys increased its market capitalization amid the widespread losses.

title: RBI Policy: Should you lock your money in an FD since the rate cut cycle to begin soon?

title: Personal loan: What are the key differences between secured and unsecured loans? Details here

Despite slow economic growth and easing global rates, inflation stays below the central bank's target. The monetary policy committee's new members might influence future rate decisions.

description: PMS are professional investment management services that help investors achieve financial goals through customized portfolios. They offer benefits like asset diversification, regulatory compliance, and real-time access, but may have higher costs.
